title: Chapter 1458 - Returning To Familiar Ground, Asking Your Sovereign His Name
volume_title: His Sword Takes Aim A The Three Thousand Worlds Of The Stars, Suppressing Foes Both Past And Present
body:
Chapter 1458 - Returning To Familiar Ground, Asking Your Sovereign His Name

Su Yi recalled numerous matters.

Back then, it was in that very palace that Wang Ye read ancient tomes gathered from throughout the worlds and planes of the Epoch of Demonism. His goal was to uncover the origins of the Epoch of Demonism’s cultivation amidst the ancient tomes.

Wang Ye had reached such heights that he’d already started researching the transformations of the epochs and their cultivation cultures. He was after the most fundamental secrets of cultivation. 

In truth, it was his experiences exploring different planes and epochs that let Wang Ye discover the River of Epochs, which was even more mysterious than the River of Spacetime. And it was there that Wang Ye had begun his pursuit of divinity!

Alas, back then, Wang Ye faced the threat of the Prohibition of the Gods, forcing him to retreat prematurely.

Now, Wang Ye’s experiences with the divine palace floating over the lake of lava flashed through Su Yi’s mind.

Su Yi couldn’t help but be wistful over this too. Every time he fused with one of the imprints of his past lives, it expanded his horizons. His perceptions and knowledge underwent an earth-shaking transformation.

The power of Wang Ye’s Dao Imprint...
original_title: Chapter 1458 - Returning to Familiar Ground, Asking Your Sovereign His Name
